page.title: 12CUSTOMS IN TRELAWNYD
page.content: The Annual Village Flower Show has been held in the Village Hall for the past l3 years. The show is the culmination of six months preparation by the organising Committee. This Committee is made up of member of various organisations in Trelawnyd, and members are invited rather then elected. Entries, for the competitions, are invited from the surrounding districts for the competitions decided upon by the welfare committee. The Sections for the show are Flowers, Crafts, Vegetables, Fruit, Floral Art, and Photography, Cookery, and Preserves, Crafts, Childrens and Gardens. A Hobbies Section is confined to Trelawnyd Friendship Club only. A nominal entrance fee of 5p is charged for each entry.The Village Hall benefits from the Grand Raffle.
